sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import api from '../../utils/api'; const AdminFinances = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [financialData, setFinancialData] = useState({ totalContributions: 'KSh 0', totalLoans: 'KSh 0', availableFunds: 'KSh 0', monthlyTarget: 'KSh 5000' }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchFinancialData(); }, []); const fetchFinancialData = async () => { try { const [contributionsRes, loansRes, reportsRes] = await Promise.all([ api.get('/contributions'), api.get('/loans'), api.get('/reports') ]); setFinancialData({ totalContributions: contributionsRes.data.totalContributions || 'KSh 0', totalLoans: loansRes.data.availableFunds || 'KSh 0', availableFunds: reportsRes.data.data?.availableFunds || 'KSh 0', monthlyTarget: contributionsRes.data.monthlyTarget || 'KSh 5000' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching financial data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (user?.role !== 'admin') { return (

Access Denied

You don't have permission to access this page.

); } return (

Financial Management

Oversee Chama Smart's financial activities

{loading ? (
Loading...
) : ( <> {/* Financial Overview Cards */}

{financialData.totalContributions}

Total Contributions

{financialData.totalLoans}

Loans Outstanding

{financialData.availableFunds}

{/* Recent Transactions */}
Recent Contributions

No recent contributions to display.

Pending Loan Applications

No pending loan applications.

{/* Financial Actions */}
Quick Actions
)}
); }; export default AdminFinances;
